Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at State/116th
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, State, 111th, Wentworth and 115th due to street blockage near State/116th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
